parameters.info: MSUtils command to execute
parameters.name: command

parameters.info: Input MS name
parameters.name: inset

parameters.info: Output MS name
parameters.name: outset

parameters.info: Column name
parameters.name: col

parameters.info: bool array with True for channels to base the analysis on 'False' channels will be ignored
parameters.name: channels

parameters.info: nx2 array with antenna pairs for baselines to base the analysis on
parameters.name: baselines

parameters.info: Fields to select or None if all fields should be used
parameters.name: fields

parameters.info: Size of image in pixels
parameters.name: imsize

parameters.info: Size of cell in arcsec
parameters.name: cell

parameters.info: Flagging based on 'all' data, repeated per 'antenna', or repeated per 'baseline'
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: Polarization selection, Stokes 'i', or Stokes 'q'
parameters.name: pol

parameters.info: Method to determine sigma, 'fit': fit Gaussian at the max to determine sigma, standard deviation otherwise
parameters.name: threshmode

parameters.info: Distance from average beyond which data are flagged in units of sigma
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.info: Each selected point is expanded in a wedge with this radial range
parameters.name: radrange

parameters.info: Each selected point is expanded in a wedge with this angular
parameters.name: angle

parameters.info: Show histogram and cutoff line in a viewgraph
parameters.name: show

parameters.info: Do not apply flags, but (e.g. produce viewgraphs only)
parameters.name: dryrun

parameters.info: Switch commenting on and off
parameters.name: verb

parameters.info: Longitude of observatory in astropy units (defaults to what is found in the data set)
parameters.name: lon

parameters.info: Latitude of observatory in astropy units (defaults to what is found in the data set)
parameters.name: lat

parameters.info: Elevation of observatory in astropy units (defaults to what is found in the data set)
parameters.name: hei

parameters.info: Time to be flagged before sunrise in astropy units (defaults to 0)
parameters.name: avantsoleil

parameters.info: Time to be flagged after sunrise in astropy units (defaults to 0)
parameters.name: apresnuit

parameters.info: Time to be flagged before sunset in astropy units (defaults to 0)
parameters.name: avantnuit

parameters.info: Time to be flagged after sunset in astropy units (defaults to 0)
parameters.name: apresoleil

parameters.info: Flag all day time (defaults to True)
parameters.name: nononsoleil

parameters.info: Height above horizon of the sun to define sunset in astropy units (defaults to -34 arcmin)
parameters.name: horizon

parameters.info: Invert flags before applying/returning them (defaults to False)
parameters.name: flinvert
